RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Claiming Purse 12200. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AKITO brushed an inner rival leaving the gates, showed the way well in hand and a bit off of the fence around the turn, inched clear in upper stretch and held sway under drive while hanging on his left lead. WILDERZAR laid off of the pace along the inside advanced in the four path into and around the turn, sustained a rally to take aim on the clear leader in the late stages but was only second best. FATHER OF LIES brushed an inner rival at the start, stalked the leader from the three path, was roused in pursuit turning for home, but yielded after being outkicked by an outer rival in upper stretch and held show. MOON OVER DUBAI was brushed by an outer rival and forced to bump an inner foe at the start, tracked along the inside, came under heavy urging into the turn and gave way through the lane. TWELVE MINUS ONE was bumped by an outer foe at the start, raced towards the rear in the five path and failed to factor. JAYDEN'S PRINCE brushed with an outer rival t the start, chased in the three path and between for a quarter mile, but weakened into the turn and was done early.

ENTRY.NAME: Wilderzar
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace ins, advanced 4p turn, rallied, took aim late, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Twelve Minus One
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, at rear 5p, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Moon Over Dubai
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed/bump start, tracked inside, urged turn, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Akito
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush start,set pace,in hand 2p,cleared upr,left lead,held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Jayden's Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush start, chased 3p btwn, wknd 7/16, done early

ENTRY.NAME: Father of Lies
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush start,stalked 2w-3p,roused turn,yielded,outkicked,held show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 27500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 18 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowanc es) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HARTFUL HOPE chased outside of the top pair and from the four path, ranged up to striking distance nearing the lane, bid in upper stretch, changed leads while leading into the final furlong and held from an inner pursuer. DATTTSAFANCYFOX tracked in the three to two path in to the turn, took aim three wide and between horses at the furlong grounds, gained place soon after and chased the outer leader home. FABRICATE raced off of the pace two wide and between horses into the turn, shifted out to the four to five path in upper stretch and ran on late for a minor share. HOLIDAY DECISION pressed the leader from the three path, vied turning for home, led as an bidder ranged up entering the lane, got bested by that one in midstretch and gave way through the final furlong. MIMI'S GOLDEN RING set the pace inside of a prompting rival, got headed inside of that one and an outer bidder nearing the lane, then weakened nearing the final sixteenth. CHARGINA tracked along the inside but faded into the turn. LEWD raced at the rear in the four to five path and made little impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Chargina
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, faded 7/16

ENTRY.NAME: Mimi's Golden Ring
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace ins foe, headed ins pair 1/4, wknd 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Holiday Decision
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2w-3p, vied 5/16, led btwn 1/4, bested 1/8, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Fabricate
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 2wd btwn, 4-5p upr, ran on late

ENTRY.NAME: Lewd
ENTRY.COMMENT: at rear 4-5p, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Datttsafancyfox
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3-2p, took aim 3wd btwn 1/8, up place, chased

ENTRY.NAME: Hartful Hope
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3w-4p,in range 1/4,bid,led/changed leads 1/8,cleared,held

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JUNE 18. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LADY ABRIL tracked three wide, bid in the five path in midstretch and edged past. COWCHI pressed two wide, vied turning for home, led and shifted out to the four path in upper stretch but was bested by an outer bidder in the final furlong. NORTHERN JOURNEY tracked two wide and between horses, then along the inside turning for home, shifted three wide in upper stretch, gained show at the furlong grounds and held form an inner bidder. GRIZABELLA chased along the inside and kept on evenly. BAREFOOT BEACH lacked speed in the four path, fanned out to the seven path in upper stretch and ran on willingly. SWEET EMPIRE set the pace inside of a prompting foe, got headed while entering the lane in the two path and weakened between horses in the final furlong. I GOT HOPE trailed in the two path and made little impact. BAY MAGIC raced off of the pace in the three path and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Grizabella
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace ins foe, bested 2p upr, wknd btwn

ENTRY.NAME: Cowchi
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2wd, vied 5/16, led 4p upr, met bid 1/8, bested

ENTRY.NAME: Northern Journey
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2wd btwn, ins 5/16, 3wd upper, ran on, held show

ENTRY.NAME: I Got Hope
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed 2p, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Bay Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 3p, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Abril
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3wd, 5p upr, bid 1/8, edged past

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Peter J. Sheppell & Bradley G. Buchholtz

ENTRY.NAME: Barefoot Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 4p, 7p upr, willingly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 85. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHIRON tracked along the inside, bid along the rail around the far turn, led in upper stretch and drove clear. SHORTLY prompted inside of the leader and from the two path before backing off to stalk entering the backstretch, rebid outside of that one leaving the half mile pole, led into the far turn before an inner rival offered a challenge, but drifted to the four path entering the lane and was bested in upper stretch. QUICK QUICK WHIT laid off of the pace three wide, chased two wide around the far turn and kept on. GLOBAL PRIDE raced off of the pace four wide, chased three wide around the far turn and yielded. ROYAL AIR FORCE lagged behind in the five path and was outrun. RANSAM PAYNTER leaned outwardly at the start, set the pace in the three path before tucking to the inside down the backstretch, but faltered entering the far turn and was done early.

ENTRY.NAME: Chiron
ENTRY.OWNER: Isaacs Bennie E and Williams Lisa G
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, rail bid 2nd, led upper, drove clear

ENTRY.NAME: Quick Quick Whit
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 3wd, chased 2wd 2nd, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Air Force
ENTRY.OWNER: Yoder Susan and Rivera Alan Yahir
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged behind 5p, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Global Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 4wd, chased 3wd 2nd, yielded

ENTRY.NAME: Shortly
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt ins-2p,stalked,rebid 2w1/2,led 2w2nd,drifted 4p3/16,bested

ENTRY.NAME: Ransam Paynter
ENTRY.COMMENT: leaned out start, speed 3p, ins 5/8, faltered 7/16, done early

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE DECEMBER 18. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 18 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Winners Since December 18, 2022 Preferred)(Ohio Registe red Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOCK ON tracked from midpack two wide, moved forward to take aim on the leader in upper stretch, bid at the furlong grounds and drove clear. UHAVETOBEKITTENME set the pace inside of a pressing foe, drew clear entering the lane, but was bested by an outer bidder in the final furlong. SUDDENLY SEDUCTIVE raced off of the pace in the five path, shifted in to split foes in the three path nearing the furlong grounds, gained show shortly after and held that position from an outer bidder. HONOR LIFE laid off of the pace in the six path, then stayed on to attempt a late bid for show bid needed more. EXPLOSIVE HUMOUR stalked along the inside, tipped outside of the top pair entering the lane but was floated to the five path in the process, then lacked a bid. BLUE SKY'S ABOVE took light contact from an outer rival at the start, laid off of the pace in the three path and failed to menace. AMES MISTER leaned inwardly and brushed a rival while off slow, trailed then improved position. FRANK N DUCKY prompted outside of the leader and from the three path around the turn, but drifted to the four path entering the lane and folded between horses. RESCUE FIVE stalked in the four path, but drifted out to the eight path entering upper stretch and faded. TUFF ATTACK pursued from midpack along the inside but weakened into the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Explosive Humour
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, tipped 5p3/16, lacked bid

ENTRY.NAME: Tuff Attack
ENTRY.COMMENT: midpack inside, wknd 7/16

ENTRY.NAME: Lock On
ENTRY.OWNER: Haehn T R and Molumby John
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked midpack 2wd, took aim upper, bid 1/8, cleared

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Sky's Above
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed start, off pace 3p, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Ames Mister
ENTRY.COMMENT: leaned in/brush/off slow, trailed, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Uhavetobekittenme
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, cleared 3/16, met bid 1/8, bested

ENTRY.NAME: Rescue Five
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 4p, drifted 8p upr, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Suddenly Seductive
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 5p, split foes 3p1/8, up show, held

ENTRY.NAME: Honor Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 6p, stayed on, show bid, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Frank N Ducky
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt 2w-3p, drifted 4p3/16, folded btw

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 18 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MUGSY MALONE was brushed by an inner rival into an outer foe early on, tugged forward to set the pace in the three to two path around the first turn, led from an outer pressing pair around the far turn, drove clear entering the lane and held sway. FROG TOWN tracked along the inside, shifted out tot he five path entering the backstretch, moved forward to press the top pair for the four path into the far turn, then ran on in pursuit of the leader through the lane. CONTROLLER shifted out and brushed a rival early on, prompted along the inside before backing off to stalk leaving the first turn, then chased around the far turn and kept on. AULD LANGE SYNE stalked in the five to three path around the first turn, pressed along with an outer rival around the far turn but gave way entering the lane. SERGEANT COUNTZLER took light contact from an inner rival early on, then saved ground off of the pace to no avail. HITE trailed in the two path and made little imapct. WEEKENDER transferred contact from an inner rival to an outer foe early on, raced off of the pace in the three to four path and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Frog Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, 5p11/16, pressed 3w-4p2nd, ran on, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Hite
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed 2p, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Controller
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Ella D Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: shifted out/brushd foe early,prompt ins,stalkd,chased 2nd,kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Mugsy Malone
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed btw early,tugged,set pace 3-2p,drove clear 3/16,held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Weekender
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed btwn early, off pace 3-4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Sergeant Countzler
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed early, off pace inside, saved ground, no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Auld Lange Syne
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 5-3p1st, pressed 2w-3pbtw 2nd, gave way 3/16

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 95. Starter Allowance Purse 17600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 18 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Consider ed In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUNAWAY HARRY stalked in the two path, bid outside of the leader at the three furlong pole, led soon after then drew off in upper stretch. ZERO GRAVITY moved forward two wide and between horses while off of the pace around the first turn, progressed down the backstretch to track into the far turn, shifted out to the four path in upper stretch and ran on to gain place at the wire. RAISON KARTER was bumped between horses at the start, laid off of the pace in the four path, ranged up outside of rivals around the far turn to bid nearing the lane, but failed to keep pace with the leader in upper stretch, yielded and got nailed at the wire for place. VENETIAN DREAM lacked speed along the inside, then in the three path around the far turn and moved up. MY BROTHER CAM bumped with an outer rival at the start, tracked in the three path, chased between horses around the far turn and gave way. TOE TAPPIN LUKE bumped with an inner rival at the start, lacked speed in the four path, then along the inside around the far turn and made little impact. SKIDSTREAM sped clear, but was headed by an outer bidder approaching the five sixteenths pole and weakened. ITASCA veered outwardly at the start, trailed while keen behind foes in the four path around the first turn and was outrun thereafter.

ENTRY.NAME: Venetian Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: far back inside, 3p2nd, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Skidstream
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: sped clear, headed 5/16, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Runaway Harry
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 2p, bid 2w3/8, led 5/16, drew off upper

ENTRY.NAME: My Brother Cam
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, tracked 3p, chased btwn 2nd, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Raison Karter
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped btw st,off pace 4p,ranged up 2nd,bid 1/4,chasd upr,yielded

ENTRY.NAME: Toe Tappin Luke
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, far back 4p, ins 2nd, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Zero Gravity
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 2p,inched closer,tracked 2nd,4p upr,ran on,up place wire

ENTRY.NAME: Itasca
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered out start, trailed, keen 4p1st, outrun

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 52. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHAKE THE FROST set the pace in the two path, met an outer challenge turning for home, dueled gamely through the lane and held. JUSTA LITTLE MOORE stalked in the four path, bid and sparked a duel turnning for home, sparred through the lane and missed. LIVING THE DREAM broke a step slow, was urged along off of the pace in the six path into the turn, then stayed on to gain show late. KELLEHER chased in the four to five path, entered the lane within range but yielded late. LUCKY VICTOR bumped an outer rival then an inner foe at the start, chased from midpack in the four path and between horses and failed to menace. OLLIE'S FOLLY took simultaneous contact from rivals on both sides at the start, pressed in the three path and between horses, chased turning for home and weakened. SEEKING FREEDOM failed to factor from the five path. DREAMINGABOUTTIME was bumped by an outer rival at the start and made little impact from the five path. VERNON'S BEST broke slowly, chased along the inside and faded turning for home. WEEKEND RETREAT broke inwardly and bumped a rival upon leaving the gates, then was outrun. PLAYFULASITGETS broke inwardly and was outrun in the two path.

ENTRY.NAME: Shake the Frost
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed ins-2p, met bid 5/16, dueled, game, held

ENTRY.NAME: Vernon's Best
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, chased inside, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Living the Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow start, urged off pace 6p, stayed on, up show late

ENTRY.NAME: Seeking Freedom
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 5p, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Dreamingabouttime
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, far back 5p, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Victor
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumps start, chased midpack 4p btwn, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Ollie's Folly
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped btwn start, pressed 2w-3p btwn, chased, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Weekend Retreat
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in/bump start, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Justa Little Moore
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 4p, bid 5/16, dueled, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Playfulasitgets
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, far back 2p, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Kelleher
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-5p, in range 3/16, yieded late
